response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the oven as per the first subtask. There were no execution errors. The next step is to pick up the lasagna.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the oven
(2) Pick up the lasagna
(3) Put the lasagna in the oven
(4) Close the oven
(5) Turn on the oven
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Pick up the lasagna
    lasagna = registry(env, "lasagna_85")
    EasyGrasp(robot, lasagna)
    donothing(env)
